name: Orthoptera
description:
A unique 3D platformer about a grasshopper trying to save their kin!
Travel through a surreal landscape to warn villagers of an encroaching storm.

Note that there is no loading bar, so just give it some time to load.
If the WebGL build is giving you performance issues, consider using the Windows build.

Be sure to replenish your stamina by landing in foliage!

Controls:
Movement: WASD or L-Stick
Jump: Space or South-Face button to charge, release to jump
Glide: hold L-Shift or L-Trigger
Progress Dialogue: E or West-Face
Respawn/Reset: R or North-Face
